name: Evolus, Inc.
description: Evolus, Inc. is a performance beauty company that focuses on delivering innovative aesthetic products for the global market. Founded in 2012 and headquartered in Newport Beach, California, Evolus is dedicated to providing non-surgical aesthetic treatments that empower individuals to express their unique beauty. The company's flagship product, Jeuveau, is an injectable neuromodulator specifically designed for aesthetic use, providing a non-invasive option for reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Evolus is committed to enhancing the customer experience through effective marketing strategies and a strong emphasis on consumer education. With the mission to make beauty accessible and to promote self-confidence, Evolus aims to disrupt the aesthetic marketplace by providing high-quality products at competitive prices. The company continues to expand its portfolio with innovative solutions that cater to the evolving needs of consumers, backed by a robust clinical development program. Evolus is also focused on building a strong brand presence and fostering relationships with healthcare professionals to ensure successful product adoption and patient satisfaction.
